title: Folk Set
description:
Deluxe edition exclusive.  Found in front of the [Front Hills](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?marker=397271) shrine.

**Set Pieces:**
- Folk Opera Mask (Headgear)
- Folk Opera Almsgiving Armor (Body)
- Folk Opera Leather Bracers (Arms)
- Folk Opera, Buskins (Legs)

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:** 7 / 14 /  5 / 8
   
**Set Bonus:** Every Bit Counts: Moderately increases the Will gained from defeating enemies (Requires 4 Pieces Equipped)

title: Guanyin's Prayer Beads
description:
**Location:** Found in a chest surrounding a dead tree within the secret [Ancient Guanyin Temple](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?marker=397380)

**Type:** Arms  

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:** 10 
   
**Effect:** After absorbing lingering will, moderately increase Maximum Health and Mana for a long duration

title: Pilgrim's Set
description:
Craftable upon reaching [Guanyin Temple Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?marker=397382) in the Forest of Wolves.  

**Set Pieces:**
- Pilgrim's Headband (Headgear)
- Pilgrim's Garb (Body)
- Pilgrim's Wristwraps (Arms)
- Pilgrim's Legwraps (Legs)

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:** 7 / 14 /  5 / 8
   
**Unique Effect:** Allows using the Gourd while sprinting (headgear)

**Set Bonus:** 
- Swift Pilgrim - Moderately increases sprint speed (2 pieces equipped)
- When Sprinting, each second moderately increases attack. This effect can stack up to 10 times. (4 pieces equipped)

**Ingredients Required:**
- 4 Yarn, 1,000 Will (Head)
- 5 Yarn, 1,200 Will (Body)
- 1 Yarn, 500 Will (Arms)
- 2 Yarn, 640 Will (Legs)

title: Serpentscale Set
description:
Craftable upon defeating the [Whiteclad Noble](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?marker=397389) 

**Set Pieces:**
- Serpentscale Battlerobe (Body)
- Serpentscale Bracers (Arms)
- Serpentscale Gaiters (Legs)

**Rarity:** Uncommon 

**Defence:**  18 /  7 / 11
   
**Unique Effect:** 
- When health is low, slowly recovers a small amount of health; if in water, the effect is enhanced (body)	
- 3% Poison Resistance (arms)
- 2% Poison Resistance (legs)	

**Set Bonus:** 
- Wave Rider - Massively reduces stamina cost when in water (3 pieces equipped)

**Ingredients Required:**
- 5 Yarn, 1,350 Will (body)
- 1 Yarn, 720 Will (arms)
- 2 Yarn, 720 Will (legs)

title: Bronze Set
description:
**Location:** Craftable upon defeating [Elder Jinchi](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?marker=397381) at the Secret [Ancient Guanyin Temple](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?marker=397380)

**Set Pieces:**
- Bronze Monkey Mask (Headgear)
- Bronze Brocade Battlerobe (Body)
- Bronze armguard (Arms)
- Bronze buskins (Legs)

**Rarity:** Rare 

**Defence:**  16 / 29 /  12 / 17
   
**Unique Effect:** 
- Performing light attack folling Evanescene directly triggers the finisher of light attack combo (arms)	
- 3% Burn Resistance (headgear), 4% Burn Resistance (arms)

**Set Bonus:** 
- Evil Crasher - Deals addition damage to the enemy upon crashing their immobilization (2 pieces equipped)
- Upon crashing the immobilization of the enemy, massively reduces the cooldown for Immobilize spell (4 pieces equipped)


**Ingredients Required:**
- 4 Yarn, 1 Silk, 810 Will (headgear)
- 5 Yarn, 2 Silk, 2,000 Will (body)
- 1 Yarn, 1 Silk, 810 Will (arms)
- 2 Yarn, 1 Silk, 1,080 Will (legs)

title: Ebongold Set
description:
**Location:** Craftable upon defeating [Black Bear Guai](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-1?marker=397388) at the end of Chapter 1

**Set Pieces:**
- Ebongold Silk Robe (Body)
- Ebongold Armguard (Arms)
- Ebongold Gaiters (Legs)

**Rarity:** Rare 

**Defence:**  31 /  13 / 19
   
**Unique Effect:** 
- 4% Burn Resistance (arms)	
- After a moment in Cloud Step, considerably increases Unveiling Strike damage (legs)  
- 2% Poison Resistance (legs)	

**Set Bonus:** 
- Dance of the Black Wind: In Cloud Step, shrouding black wind will attack enemies nearby the Destined One and the decoy continuously (4 pieces required ?? - Glitch??)	

**Ingredients Required:**
- 5 Yarn, 2 Silk, 1,800 Will (body)
- 1 Yarn, 1 Silk, 810 Will (arms)
- 4 Yarn, 2 Silk, 1,080 Will (legs)

title: Galeguard Set
description:
Craftable upon defeating the [Stone Vanguard](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=397637)	

**Set Pieces:**
- Galeguard Beast Mask (headgear)
- Galeguard Beastmaw Armor (body)
- Galeguard Bracers (arms)
- Galeguard Greaves (legs)

**Rarity:** Rare 

**Defence:** 18 / 35 / 14 / 21 
   
**Effect:** 
- 4% Shock Resistance (body)	
- Performing 3 consecutive perfect dodges within a brief moment recovers a moderate amount of Mana (legs)	

**Set Bonus:**
- Gale Guardian: Upon perfect dodges, grants considerable additional focus (2 pieces equipped)
- Perfect dodges slightly reduces cooldown for all spells (4 pieces equipped)

title: Drunken Boar's Quest
description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to the [Drunken Boar](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=398863)

**Steps:**

1. Give [Drunken Boar](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=398863) the [Sobering Stone](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=399634) (purchase from Man in Rock).
2. Find the [Drunken Boar](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=399827) in the Tiger's Temple and give him the Jade Lotus.
3. Return to where he was originally and defeat the [Yellow-Robed Squire](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=397644)

title: Ashen Slumber Transformation Interaction
description:
**Location:** Inside the barricaded house.

Speak with the two headed rat inside "Ashen Slumber", and listen to their dialog completely by interacting with them until you exhaust unique dialog. They will mention they are going to head West and find the "Prince". You will meet back up with their dead body in the same cell as The Third Prince.  This interaction will make it so you do not have to fight Ashen Slumber.

title: Locked Gate
description: Can only be opened from the rear after defeating the [Earth Wolf](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=397430)

title: Locked Gate
description: Requires [Keeness of Tiger](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=398770)

title: Locked Gate
description: Open from the eastern side, where you first encounter Withered Corpses and Weasel Captains

title: Mind Core
description: Talk to Xu Dog after saving him (finishing his quest)

title: Rattle Drum Quest Location 1
description: Collect Rattle Drum from the [Tiger's Acolyte](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=397636) and then come here.

title: Rattle Drum Quest Location 2
description: After going to the first location for the rattle drum quest, come here and use the drum again.

title: Rattle Drum Final Location
description: After doing both of the previous locations, come to the well behind where the horse guai was tied up and use the rattle drum one last time. This will queue a cutscene and allow access to the bottom of the well.

title: Xu Dog
description:
**Location:** Inside the cave. 

Defeat [Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=397429) and then return to him with the [Evil Repelling Medicant](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=398788) formula.  He will teach you how to brew them at Shrines

**Related Quest:** [Xu Dog's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/black-myth-wukong/maps/chapter-2?marker=398921)

title: Horse Gui
description:
**Location:** Tied up next to the statue. Exhaust all his dialogue options.

title: Snow Fox Quest
description:
Corpse leaning on the arch. Gives fox transformation item

Steps:
1. After listening to the whole story, you get an item to transform into a fox. 
2. Go to Non-Void in fox form.
3. After defeating him, you must return here and talk to the corpse again

title: The Third Prince - Lower Pagoda Realm
description:
Blinded and deafened NPC in the cell blocked by purple seal.

Defeat Captain Lotus-Vision to enter the cell.
Defeat Captain Wise-Voice, Captain Kalpa-Wave, and Captain Void-Illusion and return to him to finish his questline.

Receive Chubai Spearhead for completion and absorb Ashen Slumber transformation from his dead cell mate.
